fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Communication
head_office_address: Ravenscourt Campus Three Rock Road Sandyford
eu_initiatives:
1. Up-skilling and Training initiatives 
2. Development of analytical and cloud based technologies in support of Smart Technologies and IoT
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Innopharma Labs is an education and technology company. Innopharma education delivers up-skilling and re-skilling programmes for people who wish to develop their careers in the advanced manufacturing sectors of pharmaceutical, medical devices, food technology and ICT. 
Innopharma Technology develop and commercialise analytical technologies for the pharma, food and fine chemical sectors, enabling the transition towards Smart Systems and Industry 4.0
